orderedTopics.name: Primitive & Reference Data Types
orderedTopics.description: Overview of Java primitive types, wrappers, and basic string usage.

orderedTopics.name: Control Flow (loops, conditionals)
orderedTopics.description: If/else, switch, for/while loops and foreach constructs.

orderedTopics.name: Arrays & Array utilities
orderedTopics.description: Working with Java arrays and related iteration patterns.

orderedTopics.name: Collections (Lists, Maps, Sets)
orderedTopics.description: Java Collections Framework: ArrayList/LinkedList/Vector/Stack, HashMap, HashSet and concurrent variants.

orderedTopics.name: Object-Oriented Programming (Classes & Inheritance)
orderedTopics.description: Core OOP concepts: classes, inheritance, polymorphism and encapsulation.

orderedTopics.name: Interfaces & Multiple Inheritance via Interfaces
orderedTopics.description: Use of Java interfaces, default/static methods, and combining interfaces for multiple inheritance-like behavior.

orderedTopics.name: Enums
orderedTopics.description: Java enum types and simple use-cases.

orderedTopics.name: Exceptions & Error Handling
orderedTopics.description: Checked vs unchecked exceptions, try/catch/finally, and custom exception patterns.

orderedTopics.name: I/O (File IO)
orderedTopics.description: Reading/writing files using Java IO APIs (streams, readers/writers).

orderedTopics.name: Generics
orderedTopics.description: Generic classes, methods, bounded type parameters and wildcards.

orderedTopics.name: Functional Programming & Lambdas
orderedTopics.description: Lambda expressions, functional interfaces and simple stream-like operations.

orderedTopics.name: Streams (java.util.stream)
orderedTopics.description: Stream pipeline operations: map/filter/reduce, and basic stream processing patterns.

orderedTopics.name: Inner & Nested Classes
orderedTopics.description: Member inner classes, local classes, anonymous classes and static nested classes.

orderedTopics.name: Annotations & Reflection (metadata)
orderedTopics.description: Custom annotations and runtime reflection to inspect classes/methods/fields.

orderedTopics.name: Serialization
orderedTopics.description: Java serialization/deserialization using java.io.Serializable and related patterns.

orderedTopics.name: Multithreading & Concurrency
orderedTopics.description: Thread lifecycle, Runnable/Thread, executors and concurrent patterns.

orderedTopics.name: Networking (Sockets)
orderedTopics.description: Basic socket programming for TCP client/server interactions.

orderedTopics.name: GUI (Swing)
orderedTopics.description: Simple Swing GUI patterns: frames, panels and event handling.

orderedTopics.name: Date & Time (java.time)
orderedTopics.description: Working with modern Java date/time APIs (java.time).

orderedTopics.name: Testing (JUnit example)
orderedTopics.description: Unit testing basics using JUnit examples under test/ folder.
